metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
resource group name where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
subscription id where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

connectorUiConfig.title: Cyfirma Cyber Intelligence Connector
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The Cyfirma Cyber Intelligence data connector enables seamless log ingestion from the DeCYFIR API into Microsoft Sentinel. Built on the Microsoft Sentinel Codeless Connector Platform, it leverages the DeCYFIR Alerts API to retrieve logs. Additionally, it supports DCR-based [ingestion time transformations](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/custom-logs-overview), which parse security data into a custom table during ingestion. This eliminates the need for query-time parsing, enhancing performance and efficiency.

graphQueries.metricName: Total Cyfirma Threat Actors logs received

sampleQueries.description: Get Sample of Threat Actors logs

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaIndicators_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaIndicators_CL
 | where TimeGenerated > ago(5m) | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
  | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaThreatActors_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaThreatActors_CL
 | where TimeGenerated > ago(5m) | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
  | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaCampaigns_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaCampaigns_CL
 | where TimeGenerated > ago(5m) | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
  | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyfirmaMalware_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyfirmaMalware_CL
 | where TimeGenerated > ago(5m) | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
  | where isnotempty(Time)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

instructionSteps.title: Cyfirma Cyber Intelligence Data Connector
instructionSteps.description: This connector provides the Indicators, Threat actors, Malware and Campaigns logs from Cyfirma Cyber Intelligence. The connector uses the DeCYFIR API to retrieve logs and supports DCR-based ingestion time transformations, parsing security data into a custom table during ingestion. This eliminates the need for query-time parsing, enhancing performance and efficiency.
instructionSteps.descriptionMarkdown: This connector provides the Indicators, Threat actors, Malware and Campaigns logs from Cyfirma Cyber Intelligence. The connector uses the DeCYFIR API to retrieve logs and supports DCR-based ingestion time transformations, parsing security data into a custom table during ingestion. This eliminates the need for query-time parsing, enhancing performance and efficiency.

parameters.label: Pull all IoC's Or Tailoried IoC's
parameters.name: apiAll
parameters.description: Set to true to pull all IoC's, set to false to pull tailoried IoC's

parameters.label: Recommended Actions
parameters.placeholder: Recommended Action can be any one of:All/Monitor/Block
parameters.name: recommendedActions

parameters.label: Threat Actor Associated
parameters.placeholder: Is any Threat Actor Associated with the IoC's
parameters.name: is-threat-actor-exists

dataFlows.transformKql:
source 
| extend
    TimeGenerated=created,
    ThreatType=indicator_types[0],
    Tags=labels,
    ConfidenceScore = confidence,
    Description=description,
    IndicatorID = id
| extend ParsedJson = parse_json(extensions)
| extend ExtensionID = extract(@"(extension-definition--[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12})", 1, tostring(extensions))
| extend ext = ParsedJson[ExtensionID]
| extend props = ext.properties
| extend 
    ThreatActors = props.threat_actors,
    Country = props.country,
    RecommendedActions = tostring(props.recommended_actions),
    SecurityVendors=  tostring(props.security_vendors),
    Sources = tostring(props.sources),
    Roles = tostring(props.roles),
    IPAbuse= tostring(props.ip_abuse_categories)
| project-away
    ['type'],
    ParsedJson,
    ExtensionID,
    ext,
    props,
    confidence,
    labels,
    indicator_types,
    id,
    description,
    pattern_type,
    spec_version

source
| extend
    TimeGenerated=created,
    Aliases=aliases,
    ThreatType=threat_actor_types[0],
    PrimaryMotivation=primary_motivation,
    Description=description
| extend ParsedJson = parse_json(extensions)
| extend ExtensionID = extract(@"(extension-definition--[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12})", 1, tostring(extensions))
| extend ext = ParsedJson[ExtensionID]
| extend props = ext.properties
| extend 
    Country = props["origin-of-country"],
    TargetCountries = props["target-countries"],
    TargetIndustries = props["target-industries"],
    TargetTechnologies = props["target-technologies"]
| project-away type, ParsedJson, ExtensionID, ext, props, threat_actor_types, spec_version, primary_motivation,aliases,description

source
| extend
    TimeGenerated = last_seen,
    Name=name,
    CampaignID=id,
    Description=description,
    Aliases=aliases,
    Modified=modified,
    FirstSeen=first_seen,
    LastSeen=last_seen,
    Created=created
| extend ParsedJson = parse_json(extensions)
| extend ExtensionID = extract(@"(extension-definition--[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12})", 1, tostring(extensions))
| extend ext = ParsedJson[ExtensionID]
| extend props = ext.properties
| extend 
    Country = props["geographies"],
    Technologies = props["technologies"],
    Industries = props["industries"]
| project-away
    ParsedJson,
    created,
    name,
    id,
    description,
    aliases,
    ExtensionID,
    ext,
    props,
    spec_version,
    ['type'],
    first_seen,
    modified,
    last_seen

source
| extend
    TimeGenerated=last_seen,
    Name=name,
    MalwareID=id,
    Description=description,
    Aliases=aliases,
    Modified=modified,
    FirstSeen=first_seen,
    LastSeen=last_seen,
    Created=created,
    ThreatType=malware_types[0],
    IsFamily=is_family
| extend ParsedJson = parse_json(extensions)
| extend ExtensionID = extract(@"(extension-definition--[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12})", 1, tostring(extensions))
| extend ext = ParsedJson[ExtensionID]
| extend props = ext.properties
| extend 
    Countries = props["geographies"],
    Technologies = props["technologies"]
| project-away
    ParsedJson,
    created,
    name,
    id,
    description,
    aliases,
    ExtensionID,
    ext,
    props,
    spec_version,
    ['type'],
    first_seen,
    modified,
    last_seen,
    malware_types,
    is_family
